competition_summary.context: Competition The principal methods of competition within the energy services industry are technological innovation, quality of service, and price differentiation. These factors vary geographically and are dependent upon the different services and products that SLB offers. SLB has numerous competitors, both large and small. Intellectual Property SLB owns or controls the industry’s leading portfolio of intellectual property, including but not limited to patents, proprietary information, trade secre
